question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. "pay here" sign
B. street clock
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The street clock is in the foreground, mounted on a post near the sidewalk, while the "pay here" sign is further back on the right side of the image, making the clock clearly closer to the camera.
